actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to provide for funding of the shortfalls in State allotments for fiscal year 2007 under the State Children's Health Insurance Program (SCHIP).
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Amends title XXI (State Children's Health Insurance Program) (SCHIP) to provide for funding of the shortfalls in state allotments for FY2007 in the same manner that shortfall funding requirements apply to FY2006.

titles.title: To amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to provide for funding of the shortfalls in State allotments for fiscal year 2007 under the State Children's Health Insurance Program (SCHIP).
